# AP2 - Agent Payments Protocol Documentation

> The Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) is a solution for enabling gen AI agents to make payments on behalf of users, safely, securely, and in a decentralized and privacy protecting manner. This protocol is a part of the broader ecosystem, which includes agentic protocols like A2A and MCP, and encompasses the global nature of payments.


## Introduction

- [Home](https://ap2-protocol.org/index.md)
